title: AI breaks the hamster wheel of journalism
description: The hamster wheel has been a defining metaphor for what it’s like to work in contemporary journalism: an experience marked by relentless motion but often too little progress to show for it. In 2026, the wheel may finally start to fall apart — and, if so, generative AI will be responsible. The hamster wheel metaphor...
